origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'MarketAPI.get_forecast', 'description': 'This function provides market forecasts and economic trends for a specified sector and duration.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'sector', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The sector for which the forecast is requested, e.g., Technology, Healthcare.'}, {'name': 'duration', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time duration for the forecast, e.g., 2023-2024.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'marketForecast', 'description': 'The detailed market forecast including economic trends.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 MarketAPI.get_forecast, 它的参数输入如下: 'sector'是'Technology', 'duration'是'2023-2024'.
